# Learn about API authentication here: /r/getting-started # Find your api_key here: /settings/api library(plotly) data <- list( list( x = c(0, 1, 2), y = c(6, 10, 2), error_y = list( type = "data", array = c(1, 2, 3), visible = TRUE ), type = "scatter" ) ) response <- py$plotly(data, kwargs=list(filename="basic-error-bar", fileopt="overwrite")) url <- response$url
